thread.title: What do your friends reveal about your work? (The University of Akron)
thread.title_full: What do your friends reveal about your work? (The University of Akron) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: What do your friends reveal about your work? (The University of Akron)
text: ( Source : The University of Akron ) The company you keep outside of work influences your actions on the job. Dr. Erin Makarius If your friends represent races different than your own, you're likely to develop supportive working relationships
